entry.dcterms:description: using financial and investment services, use of bank account and bank card, forms of savings, choice of banks; the savings of the family and the bank services used by them

trade, industry and markets
persons and households
survey data
cross-section
From the Budapest agglomeration 4 settlements were selected based on the request of the customer, and altogether proportionately 500 persons were included in the sample.
face-to-face interview
